module.name: lang/with
module.description: This module provides a basic strategy for specifying run-time verified strategies.
module.author: Lennart Kats <lennart add lclnet.nl>

strategy.name: with
strategy.description:
Evaluate a strategy s, or, if s fails, end with a fatal error.
failures raised by with clauses and uses of this strategy.

strategy.name: catch-with
strategy.description:
Evaluate strategy s1 and catch with-failures that get thrown. If s1 throws a with-failure then s2 is called on the original input term and a List(String) representation of the stack trace. The following defines the behaviour of catch-with on input term t:
<s1> t if success(s1) or fail(s1) <s2> (message, t, trace) if withfail(s1)
